## ğŸ• Automation Trigger (Scheduler)

**This node's function:**
- Automatically runs the workflow every 10 minutes
- Performs news checks at specific intervals
- Ensures continuous updated news flow

**How to configure:**
1. Double-click on the node
2. Set time interval in Trigger Times section
3. Mode: Select 'Every X'
4. Value: Enter desired number (e.g., 10)
5. Unit: Choose time unit (minutes, hours, days)

**Recommended settings:**
- For high-frequency news sites: 5-10 minutes
- For normal usage: 30 minutes - 1 hour
- For less frequently updated sources: 2-6 hours

## ğŸ“¡ RSS News Sources

**These nodes' function:**
- Fetch news data from RSS feeds
- Process news from different categories separately
- Provide structured data in JSON format

**How to configure:**
1. Double-click on RSS Feed Read node
2. Enter RSS feed URL in URL field
3. Configure additional settings in Options section

**Example RSS sources:**

- https://feeds.bbci.co.uk/rss.xml

**Important notes:**
- Use separate nodes for each RSS source
- Verify that RSS URLs are active
- Be careful about copyright issues

## ğŸ”„ News Merging and Processing

**This node's function:**
- Merges news from different RSS sources
- Collects all news data in a single flow
- Prepares for next processing steps

**How it works:**
1. Merge node combines all incoming data
2. Synchronizes news from different sources
3. Standardizes data format

**No configuration needed:**
- This node works automatically
- No manual configuration required
- Just ensure connections are correct

**Data flow:**
- Input: Multiple RSS sources
- Process: Data merging
- Output: Combined news list

## ğŸ“± Telegram Message Sending

**This node's function:**
- Sends filtered news to Telegram
- Shares image and text content together
- Uses customized message format

**Configuration steps:**
1. **Create Telegram Bot:**
   - Message @BotFather
   - Use /newbot command
   - Save your bot token

2. **Find Chat ID:**
   - Send message to your bot
   - Visit https://api.telegram.org/bot<TOKEN>/getUpdates
   - Copy the chat ID

3. **Configure in n8n:**
   - Enter bot token in Credentials
   - Fill in Chat ID field
   - Customize message format

**Message format:**
- Title: Main news headline
- Summary: Brief description
- Link: News detail link
- Hashtag: Category tag

**Security notes:**
- Keep bot token secure
- Enter correct Chat ID
- Be mindful of rate limits
